heroNotFound.title: Hero Not Found
heroNotFound.description: The hero page you're looking for doesn't exist. Please check the URL or browse the full hero list.

general.title: Something Went Wrong
general.description: An error occurred while loading this page. Please try again in a moment.
general.cacheHint: This can happen when browser cache is outdated. Click the button below to clear the cache and refresh.

competition-not-found.title: Competition Not Found
competition-not-found.description: The competition you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.

team-not-found.title: Team Not Found
team-not-found.description: The team you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.

match-not-found.title: Match Not Found
match-not-found.description: The match you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.
